file_content.text: There you are. I'd like you to meet the ship's cargo, en route to the Eternal Throne.
Admiral Zasha Ranken, one of the few experienced officers to survive Zakuul's conquest. You may recall her from your time on Kuat.
It's a great pleasure to see you again.
Zasha Ranken, decorated Imperial admiral. One of the few experienced officers to survive Zakuul's conquest.
A pleasure to meet you--your reputation precedes you, of course.
Tai Cordan, former President of Balmorra. Now with the Galactic Senate.
Commander.
I believe you already know Tai Cordan.
Barsen'thor. It's been a long time since Balmorra. I'm with the Galactic Senate now. Glad to see you alive and kicking.
And finally, Malita Tal. She was a popular holo-performer back home.
She became one of the first to loudly question Arcann's rule. It was either go into exile or be killed.
A pleasure and an honor. You inspire me. You inspire us all.
What makes these three so important to Arcann?
Why are they headed for Zakuul?
You, in essence.
We knew of your Alliance. For each of us, it made sense to join, but we didn't know how to reach you. In searching, we found each other.
We all knew influential people whose ears we could bend. Loyalties we could ensure. So we started an alliance of our own, inspired by yours.
It wasn't long before we were found out and captured.
I don't see that happening, Commander. But I do want you to try. I want you to try with all your might.
Having better luck than with the blast doors. Almost like the captain's distracted.
Don't worry. We'll have you out of there in no time.
You'll be safe soon.
There isn't a doubt in my mind. But we aren't simply helpless prisoners in need of rescue. Everyone here is eager to join your cause!
Arcann assumes we're affiliated with you. He wants to "interview" us--to discover where you are.
We could use more allies. You'll all be welcome in the Alliance, assuming you're still interested.
Join us, all of you.
Are you kidding? Sign me up. Literally--if there's anything I have to sign, let me know.
We aren't as formal as all that, Senator.
Hear that? Everyone either wants to be like me or kill me.
It really is all about me.
I can certainly attest to that in this particular moment.
The GEMINI captain sent out a message. Arcann's on his way.
He already knows.
Well. That will make this rescue more difficult.
And... you're free.
Oh. That was meant to take you at least four minutes longer. I hope my calibrations haven't been affected.
Stay here until we secure the bridge.
The rest are their bodyguards and associates, captured alongside them.
We're in the middle of a mission! I can't be playing nursemaid for a bunch of prisoners!
I don't have time for this!
These people have suffered because they dared to stand against Arcann. These are exactly the kind of allies we need.
We aren't as formal as all that, Senator.
I can certainly attest to that in this particular moment.
